title: Riot treats people like there 10 years old
body:
Chat banned for "negative chat" all the chats are out of context and stupid. only banned because enough people reported me aka 1 person and their que.

XXXTESTICLE: god i cant believe that we didnt surrender

Post-Game

XXXTESTICLE: lmao
XXXTESTICLE: the reports are being filed

XXXTESTICLE: morg copy and paste the report
XXXTESTICLE: i want to see the kind words you have for me
Game 3
Pre-Game
XXXTESTICLE: mif
XXXTESTICLE: mid
XXXTESTICLE: milf
XXXTESTICLE: milf
XXXTESTICLE: milf
XXXTESTICLE: milkf
XXXTESTICLE: mid
In-Game
XXXTESTICLE: wow
XXXTESTICLE: that was so bad
XXXTESTICLE: i could have turned on you so bad
XXXTESTICLE: nice ult
XXXTESTICLE: couldnt kill me without it now stop camping mid
XXXTESTICLE: just wait untill you cant kill me
XXXTESTICLE: im already almost ther
XXXTESTICLE: hi rengar can you play top
XXXTESTICLE: we have a jungle thanks
XXXTESTICLE: reported for trolling
XXXTESTICLE: enjoy your suspension
XXXTESTICLE: your griefing
XXXTESTICLE: report rengar

XXXTESTICLE: hes griefing thanks
XXXTESTICLE: for understanding
XXXTESTICLE: you didnt get it
XXXTESTICLE: hence you pick a different lane
XXXTESTICLE: ?
XXXTESTICLE: it goes by who calls it first not your feeling
XXXTESTICLE: bye kid

XXXTESTICLE: nobodys toxic but you, you brought smite top
XXXTESTICLE: like stop talking pls

XXXTESTICLE: watch out for the ac130s

XXXTESTICLE: and hes saying i threatened his life?
XXXTESTICLE: NO one is being toxic stop trolling
XXXTESTICLE: report rengar gg

replies.body:
>only banned because enough people reported me aka 1 person and their que. 

You were actually more likely banned for insults/harassment, and there's no context that really changes the meaning of these lines:

> XXXTESTICLE: keep going r%%%%%
> XXXTESTICLE: report this tard
> XXXTESTICLE: cause your useless
> XXXTESTICLE: piss off kid
> XXXTESTICLE: so i can go kill myself
> XXXTESTICLE: kids are so toxic
> XXXTESTICLE: bye kid

what I'm saying is you haven't seen the other half of this and if you did your opinion would be different. maybe riot should send the full-text log instead of your own, from this perspective I look like the bad person, but in reiltiy, I was being berated by the other people in the game because i had never played the champ before.

Doubtful. We can see what you said and that's all that matters in each case. if they too have a punishment in place and then posted theirs we'd see that and be able to really say the same thing.

> I was being berated by the other people in the game because i had never played the champ before.

If that is true, the best way to deal with it is say nothing, mute them and move on.
you say doubtful because you don't see the other half and have a biased opinion on it, move on, please. I'm not looking for a repeal I could care less. I just want the report system fixed.
Nothing to fix when it's working as intended.
explain to me how the service is working. You have a robot with no actual judgment handing out bans, please explain.

I can already tell 100% if it was a person that handed that out, you'd be acting exactly the same. So it's working as intended as it is dealing with the things that are written in its code to be against how Riot feels players should treat each other.

I've had a chat restriction in the past and had no problem with it, just severed it out.

yeah okay, if I was contacted by a person and not a pre-written response or even with, "We have reviewed full chat logs of the game and deemed both parties to be breaking game terms so we deem both parties have been given a chat restriction" I would be perfectly fine.  The system is not okay I've had this game since 2011. The system does not work.

It's not that it doesn't work, it just has a horrible transparency and a poor education system to it. 

Let's have you understand the behavioral system a bit more. Think of it like a health bar (or tension meter) in music games. When you hit the note at an off beat,  your tension meter  increases. When you completely miss a note, the meter increases by alot. When you hit the note at good timings, it reduces the meter. 

Riot's behavior system works the same way, as in we all have a toxicity meter attached to our accounts. When players are mildly toxic, it goes up a tad. When people use hate speech, it pretty much fills up the meter. of course, clean games reduce the meter. 

It is possible for playerA to get punished and playerB not to, even though playerB was waaayyyyy more toxic . Let's say playerA started the game with the toxicity meter at 95% and playerB's at 35%. Ingame, playerB said some pretty nasty shit and playerA responds with some shit as well. After the game, playerA gains 10% toxicity and playerB gains 50%. Now playerA is at 105% toxicity and gets punished, whereas playerB is at 85%, and not punished in that specific game, even though playerB was found to be 5x more toxic than playerA in that game.
i get that but like i had honor 4 and now its gone like its so dumb( this was a very good way of looking at it and i appreciate it)

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T18:53:05.130+0000)...and if you did your opinion would be different.

I *promise* you I would still find this behavior unacceptable. I might *also* find *their* behavior unacceptable, but it would not change my opinion of yours in the slightest.

i never said my behavior wasn't unacceptable I don't care about mine. It's about equality if my teammates are being toxic and im being toxic back just because they have more power with friends in the game im the only punished it doesn't make any sense.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=0000000000030000,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:20:53.780+0000)
>
> i never said my behavior wasn't unacceptable I don't care about mine. It's about equality if my teammates are being toxic and im being toxic back just because they have more power with friends in the game im the only punished it doesn't make any sense.

They don't have more power. The system checks for *1 or more* reports, and if it finds one or more it flags the game for review. The subsystem that actually *reviews* the games doesn't know *or* care how many times you got reported.

Additionally, you don't always get an alert when someone else is punished, so it's possible they faced punishment as well.

it does though and it states so in the report email they send you "I know these can be subjective concepts. I myself was once banned for calling my teammates “weak, fleshy underlings.” Even though I meant well, (**enough of them**) reported me for it that I re-programmed my communication style. By acting diplomatic and calm, I’m now able to bend them to my will without succumbing to the forbidden dance of verbal abuse.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=000000000003000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:30:58.644+0000)it does though and it states so in the report email they send you "I know these can be subjective concepts. I myself was once banned for calling my teammates “weak, fleshy underlings.” Even though I meant well, (**~~enough of them~~**) reported me for it that I re-programmed my communication style. By acting diplomatic and calm, I’m now able to bend them to my will without succumbing to the forbidden dance of verbal abuse.

Whoever you were talking to was either misinformed or meant that "enough of them" meant "over several games." The guy who *wrote the report system* came onto these boards to discuss its actual functionality, and he specified that the number of reports in a single game doesn't matter at all.
Lmao, that was the pre-written message from riot, so i guess i just blew your mind.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=00000000000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:36:54.282+0000)
>
> Lmao, that was the pre-written message from riot, so i guess i just blew your mind.

Not really, although I'd be interested to see the screenshot, as to my knowledge on the topic that is not a prewritten part of ANY message Riot sends.
It is part of the Blitzcrank Bot auto response now.

> [{quoted}](name=rujitra,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=0000000000030000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-08-23T20:06:42.250+0000)
>
> It is part of the Blitzcrank Bot auto response now.

Oh, interesting! Thanks for that.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=0000000000030000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:42:35.938+0000)
>
> stop acting like 10 year old, that pretty toxic to say that I'm acting like i'm 10 years old, because I'm standing up against a broken system but then again your a moderator for a broken game, maybe you should tell your game coders or support staff to change the dumb email they send out with false information on it. Have a good day.

First off, us volunteer forum mods don't work for Riot. We're just fellow players with special privileges.

Second off, there's standing up for something and then there's just refusing to listen to reason. Multiple people in this thread have tried to explain to you why you were punished, where you went wrong, how the system works and how even if the chat logs of the other players in the game were given the outcome of your case wouldn't change, but instead of listening you'd rather complain and get mad that you're not getting the answers you want to hear. That's how a little kid acts, and you're definitely acting like one right now. You may claim that you don't care about the punishment, but clearly you do and are just mad that the "they started it/were worse" excuse doesn't work here. If you were hoping to get Yesman answers only here then you're out of luck.

It's fine if you disagree with how the system works, and you're welcome to have a civil discussion about it by offering up actual feasible solutions to the problems you have with it. That said you can't ignore the fact that your behavior in your logs was problematic to the point where you were issued a punishment, and no amount of excuses, finger pointing or sticking your fingers in your ears will change that. At some point one has to be willing to recognize and accept where they were in the wrong at rather than be stubborn and act like they are always right.

This is where I'm getting annoyed, IM NOT SAYING I WASNT TOXIC. Good now that I've said it again ill continue, I'm not refusing to listen to people, I've responded to every single comment on the forum, I'm solely here because I want equal punishment between two people, I got people saying im trash and that im trolling but then I say piss off and I'm the only one banned, how is that in any way shape or form fair. I don't care if people disagree with me i live in the USA where freedom of speech is allowed and encouraged your acting like a child by saying all these false statements about me. " your only looking for yesman answers" "your acting like a little kid" " I'm mad because they started it/ it was worse" I didn't come in here saying these things or looking for those responses so for you to say it, is making me scratch my head. I don't know who gave a mod role but they need to take it away, you only came into this forum to start a fight. I'll say it again have a good day.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=000000000003000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T20:26:16.713+0000)
>
> This is where I'm getting annoyed, IM NOT SAYING I WASNT TOXIC.

Really? Cause in a couple of your posts here it looks as though you're saying your behavior isn't a problem correct me if I'm wrong.

>Good now that I've said it again ill continue, I'm not refusing to listen to people, I've responded to every single comment on the forum, I'm solely here because I want equal punishment between two people, I got people saying im trash and that im trolling but then I say piss off and I'm the only one banned, how is that in any way shape or form fair.

Except that people have tried to explain to you that if they were also acting up were reported and have a history of poor behavior then most likely they received a punishment too. I fail to see what's so hard to understand about that. As for equal punishment everyone has their own punishment history, so behavior that got Person A a chat restriction might end up giving Person B a 2-week or permanent ban depending on their punishment history and vice versa. Consistency X Severity.

>I don't care if people disagree with me i live in the USA where freedom of speech is allowed and encouraged your acting like a child by saying all these false statements about me. " your only looking for yesman answers" "your acting like a little kid" I don't know who gave a mod role but they need to take it away, you only came into this forum to start a fight. I'll say it again have a good day.

Freedom of speech =/= freedom of speech consequences. All it means is that the US government can't make laws limiting speech but it not only doesn't protect you from the consequences of speech but it also doesn't apply to privately owned establishments such as Riot Games.

As for me trying to pick a fight I'm not trying to. That said your behavior in this thread comes off as antagonistic and confrontational when you're met with points you disagree with, hence my previous posts statements.
well, if you want to be treated like an adult, then act like an adult.
i don't get your point. I was acting like an adult defending myself, I'm not gonna be bullied by children on a game.
I would hardly called how you acted in these logs how a real MATURED adult would defend himself.  More like how a kid would counter-flamed.
nobody said i was being mature i could care less to im playing a game for kids. I just want fair bans in the game.
so your title is misleading?  Rito treated you like exactly how you acted.
i didn't mean for it to be this is my first forum, ill change it.

I guess you thought you were acting like an adult, but you were actually acting like a 10 year old. 

That's why Riot treated you like a 10 year old, cos your behavior was reflected as such.

EDIT: wtf is that name of yours? What are you, 10 years old?
lmao sorry, I wasn't acting my age on a video game. it wont happen again. dad
Glad you understand son. Now let's go stomp some nublets together.
if you want. {{champion:122}}

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-08-23T18:55:36.044+0000)
>
> i don't get your point. I was acting like an adult defending myself, I'm not gonna be bullied by children on a game.

I'm curious as to how "piss off kid" is defensive or is considered acting like an adult....and that was one of your milder comments.
(piss off kid) Commonly used to tell someone to leave you alone, can't believe you couldn't figure that out.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:55:58.997+0000)
>
> (piss off kid) Commonly used to tell someone to leave you alone, can't believe you couldn't figure that out.

I don't know about commonly..... I stopped talking to people that way 30 years ago because it made me sound childish and immature.
lmao 30 years ago I'm only 20, maybe that's why you have a different view on this being in your 40s

>XXXTESTICLE: enjoy your suspension

I like this line
that's a good one right. Should have been the other way around expect riot doesn't show the full logs so you just end up looking like a dick.
Two people can look like dicks at the same time.

Confucius say: Man don't throw stone in glass house.

Your name does not inspire an adult nature.

You got chat restricted because you broke the rules, not because some premade reported you (Mind you, 1 report = 9 reports)
Nah, they aren't out of context. You flamed and were toxic, which is against the rules. There's no context needed for that and because it's YOUR punishment, YOUR  chat logs will be shows because they are what you got punished for

I definitely did not flame lmao they're extremely out of context but then again how would you know, you weren't there. And where are you getting that 1 report= 10 because if that's true it's beyond stupid.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:10:22.102+0000)
>
> I definitely did not flame lmao they're extremely out of context but then again how would you know, you weren't there. And where are you getting that 1 report= 10 because if that's true it's beyond stupid.

1 report has the same value as 4 reports or 9 reports. Only 1 report is needed for the game to be flagged for review
"I definitely did not flame" Are we going to pretend that the 4th line in your logs is already flame and it doesn't get any better the further down we scroll
Your logs are just full of toxicity and flaming
I don't really understand what context we would need
Your logs were toxic and you got banned for it. No matter the context you gave us, the logs would still be toxic and bannable
And how do you know that the other people didn't get punished too? Oh yeah, you don't know that

I never stated my chats were toxic, if i was flaming i would be permabanned from the game. The context is extremely important you don't go into a courtroom on a jury and go hey that man shot someone lets put him in jail, but what really happened is the man he shot broke into his house and tried to kill him. The whole point of this forum is equal to pushiment.  If i logged in and saw you and your teammates were deemed toxic and have been chat banned i wouldn't be on the forums.  And the report statement is untrue it even states in the email they send you. "I know these can be subjective concepts. I myself was once banned for calling my teammates “weak, fleshy underlings.” Even though I meant well, (**enough of them reported me**) for it that I re-programmed my communication style. By acting diplomatic and calm, I’m now able to bend them to my will without succumbing to the forbidden dance of verbal abuse."

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:35:42.985+0000)
>
> I never stated my chats were toxic, if i was flaming i would be permabanned from the game. The context is extremely important you don't go into a courtroom on a jury and go hey that man shot someone lets put him in jail, but what really happened is the man he shot broke into his house and tried to kill him. The whole point of this forum is equal to pushiment.  If i logged in and saw you and your teammates were deemed toxic and have been chat banned i wouldn't be on the forums.  And the report statement is untrue it even states in the email they send you. "I know these can be subjective concepts. I myself was once banned for calling my teammates “weak, fleshy underlings.” Even though I meant well, (**enough of them reported me**) for it that I re-programmed my communication style. By acting diplomatic and calm, I’m now able to bend them to my will without succumbing to the forbidden dance of verbal abuse."

You were flaming tho, a lot
But there is no context in league where you would need to flame others
Just because others are breaking the rules, doesn't give you a free pass to break the rules yourself
But how do you KNOW if someone got banned? 
And the report statement is not untrue, go ask any riot employee or specialist. No matter how many reports you get in a game, the game will be flagged for review

the email they send you is riddled with false information as figured out above, not really my fault for not understanding. when others are being mean to you do you walk away no that would make you a pussy and pussies don't make in the world.

> [{quoted}](name=XXXTESTICLE,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4i5JRwms,comment-id=000400000000000100000000,timestamp=2019-08-23T19:55:03.510+0000)
>
> the email they send you is riddled with false information as figured out above, not really my fault for not understanding. when others are being mean to you do you walk away no that would make you a pussy and pussies don't make in the world.

Want to provide screenshots of the email? Because The Djinn said that the emails don't have any of what you're claiming they have. And without proof i'd much rather believe them than you
When others are being mean to you, you can either be mature and walk away or star being equally as mean to them and act childish
I mean, nobody is forcing you to walk away and "be a pussy" but you actions have consequences
And if you break the rules, you'll be punished
